data.message: Implement skill stats auto-updates per episode outcome: Implemented Option A: store_evaluation auto-generates memory_updates from episode result + skills_used. Policy: success=+0.01, partial=+0.005, failed=-0.01. Guardrail: only skills in episode.links.skills_used can be auto-updated. auto_skill_updates=False disables. Test 3 added to smoke_test.py. All 3 tests pass.
